long.title: Sending messages maybe take a long time.
long.desc: Due to the large size of the attachment or the system being accessed by a large number of people. Please wait a moment

success.title: Message has been sent
success.desc: Message has been sent to me. Please wait to reply soon. Thank you.

error.title: Fail to send Message
error.desc: Unknown error to sending message. System maybe problem. Please try to contact me another ways.

warning.title: Format invalid or required field blank
warning.desc: Found error to sending message. Format invalid or required field is not blank.

uploadwarning.title: Larged file sizes or invalid file type
uploadwarning.desc:
Compatible File Format: JPG, PNG, PDF, DOCX, DOC
Maximum file sizes: 3 MB
